dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: A listener writes in, 'I was really concerned to hear about the incident at Abai Kazakh National Pedagogical University. What's the update on that?'
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A listener writes in, 'I was really concerned to hear about the incident at Abai Kazakh National Pedagogical University. What's the update on that?'

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, uh, the Vice Minister of Science and Higher Education, Talgat Yeshenkulov, actually just commented on it at a government briefing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, uh, the Vice Minister of Science and Higher Education, Talgat Yeshenkulov, actually just commented on it at a government briefing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Vice Minister of Science and Higher Education Talgat Yeshenkulov has commented on an incident at Abai Kazakh National Pedagogical University (KazNPU), where first-year female students were instructed on how to behave in society and around men. At a government briefing, Vice Minister Talgat Yeshenkulov was asked what measures had been taken following the incident.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and this all started in early May when first-year female students were shown a video during a meeting, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and this all started in early May when first-year female students were shown a video during a meeting, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In early May, debates erupted on social media after a meeting was held at Kazakh National Pedagogical University named after Abai (KazNPU), where first-year female students were told how girls should behave in society and in the presence of men. The students were invited to the assembly hall, where a video was shown.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly—the video featured men explaining how girls should behave, like not wearing revealing clothing and even bowing to greet men properly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly-the video featured men explaining how girls should behave, like not wearing revealing clothing and even bowing to greet men properly.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the video, men of different ages explained how girls should behave in public. For example, they said girls should not wear revealing clothing, should not speak loudly, and should greet men properly " by bowing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Which, um, understandably caused a lot of mixed reactions among the students there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which, um, understandably caused a lot of mixed reactions among the students there.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The university's administration stated that the video caused mixed reactions among students.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: The university administration did acknowledge that and said they'll be more careful selecting materials like that in the future.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The university administration did acknowledge that and said they'll be more careful selecting materials like that in the future.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The university administration understands the situation and declares that in the future, it will be extremely careful in selecting materials of this nature, the statement said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And what did Yeshenkulov say about measures being taken?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And what did Yeshenkulov say about measures being taken?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: He mentioned that the university has drawn conclusions and carried out some preventive and explanatory work to ensure it doesn't happen again.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He mentioned that the university has drawn conclusions and carried out some preventive and explanatory work to ensure it doesn't happen again.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The university has drawn conclusions, and certain preventive and explanatory work has been carried out. Accordingly, this will not happen again, Yeshenkulov said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So they're basically saying these events are part of their regular educational concept, but attendance is optional for interested students.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So they're basically saying these events are part of their regular educational concept, but attendance is optional for interested students.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to information from the university, such educational events are held regularly. The doors are open, and students who are interested can attend.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, but he emphasized that they've already had conversations with all vice-rectors across universities to prevent a repeat.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, but he emphasized that they've already had conversations with all vice-rectors across universities to prevent a repeat.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A conversation has already taken place with all vice-rectors and all universities, the vice minister added.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's interesting though—the university also stated it's students' personal choices and diversity of opinion, which seems at odds with the video's message.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's interesting though-the university also stated it's students' personal choices and diversity of opinion, which seems at odds with the video's message.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, KazNPU also stated that the university is a secular educational institution that respects students' personal choices, freedom, and diversity of opinion.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely feels like a contradiction there. Hopefully the follow-up includes more inclusive messaging.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely feels like a contradiction there. Hopefully the follow-up includes more inclusive messaging.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. Thanks for keeping us updated on this.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. Thanks for keeping us updated on this.
